audiobook.description:
Author(s): Dave Ramsey Narrator(s): Dave Ramsey

In The Legacy Journey, Dave Ramsey takes a deep dive into God’s word, revealing the truth on money, wealth and how to build your personal and family legacy. It’s time to address the toxic messages in our culture that say we should be ashamed of the success God’s given us.

The Legacy Journey will show you:

  • God’s Ways of Handling Money
  • Why So Many Are Against Success
  • Five Guidelines to Setting Good Goals
  • When Enough is Enough
  • How to Leave a Legacy Worth Leaving
  • How to Safeguard Your Legacy

You can truly live and leave a lasting legacy.

Start your journey today!

Author(s): Dave Ramsey
Narrator(s): Dave Ramsey
<p><strong>In <em>The Legacy Journey</em>,</strong> Dave Ramsey takes a deep dive into God’s word, revealing the truth on money, wealth and how to build your personal and family legacy. It’s time to address the toxic messages in our culture that say we should be ashamed of the success God’s given us.</p><p><em>The Legacy Journey</em> will show you:</p><ul><li>God’s Ways of Handling Money</li><li>Why So Many Are Against Success</li><li>Five Guidelines to Setting Good Goals</li><li>When Enough is Enough</li><li>How to Leave a Legacy Worth Leaving</li><li>How to Safeguard Your Legacy</li></ul><p>You can truly live and leave a lasting legacy.</p><p><strong>Start your journey today!</strong></p><p> </p>
audiobook.name: The Legacy Journey: A Radical View of Biblical Wealth and Generosity
